department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Overhead Door and Dock Levelers Maintenance for Public Works and Government Services Canada GOV CAN Governments of the World
description: Provide all inclusive comprehensive maintenance service including all necessary toolsservicesreplacement or repair partsmaterials and labour on Overhead DoorsDock Levelers and Scissor Lifts in accordance with the Statement of Work attached herein as Annex A
full_summary:
### Title
#### Overhead Door Maintenance

### Reference
#### PW-__FK-280-81393

### Publication Information
- **Publication Date**: September 19, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 31, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT

### Project Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking contractors to provide comprehensive maintenance services for Overhead Doors, Dock Levelers, and Scissor Lifts across various government locations.

- **Contract Duration**: Five years
- **Security Requirements**: Included in the requirement. Bidders must refer to Part 6 and 7 of the bid solicitation for details.

### Tendering Procedures
- **Trade Agreements**: This bid is covered under various free trade agreements, including CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement.
- **Provision of Service**: The successful bidder will be required to provide maintenance services across six government locations, including specialized tools, services, replacement parts, materials, and labor.
- **Mandatory Site Visit**: Before accessing the sites, all attendees must provide their name, security clearance number, date of birth, and security clearance expiry date to the contracting authority.

### Evaluation Criteria
- **Lowest/Lower Bid**: The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

### Important Notes
- **CPC Connect Service**: Bidders may use the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to electronically submit their bid.
- **Site Access**: Attendees must adhere to COVID-19 measures on site, including wearing face masks and steel-toed boots.
- **Exclusions**: Requirements are subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement and other applicable agreements.

### Inquiry Procedure
Inquiries must be submitted in writing to the contracting authority:

Lynn Grogan
E-mail: [lynn.grogan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lynn.grogan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Attachments:

- [Bid Solicitation Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022
